name: Arketa
headline: Everything for your fitness or wellness business.
description: All in one platform for online and in-person classes, video on-demand, courses and website hosting.

founders.name: Rachel Lea Fishman, Founder
founders.description:
UCLA grad, yoga instructor, love yoga + group fitness classes (for now the Peloton will do), hiking, and being outdoors. Plant-based with the undeniable exception for sushi.

If I could eat and drink nothing but coffee, chocolate, avocados, hummus and sushi for the rest of my life, things would still be great!

founders.name: Josh Archer, Founder
founders.description:
Kentucky born and raised by a SoCal family. I had to move to the west coast as it was a better fit for my personality. Things move much more slowly in Kentucky...

Outside of the office, you'll find me working out in some fashion, whether that's road cycling, ocean swimming, trail running, or hiking -- I'm always moving. After all, I'm an Ironman ðŸ’ª
2x Ironman (1x World Champs)

For Wellness business Owners
# The better way to run grow your business
Meet the new standard for modern booking software. Enjoy beautiful client checkout, marketing automations, and exceptional support.
[book A DEMO](https://arketa.com/</book-a-demo>)[TRY NOW](https://arketa.com/<http:/www.arketa.com/free-trial>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654d5a0375a17dfee3425e02/66b6716b6c678bff13d6d3dd_Capterra%20Badge.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654d5a0375a17dfee3425e02/66b6717b497a16060f62bb19_sa-frontrunners-2023%20\(1\).png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654d5a0375a17dfee3425e02/66b671366c678bff13d661f1_app%20store%20image.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654d5a0375a17dfee3425e02/65dce274025657c83cd3cf0d_HERO4.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654d5a0375a17dfee3425e02/65dce274025657c83cd3cf14_HERO-mobile.png)
## Built for all types of wellness
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654d5a0375a17dfee3425e02/65e2587d26dfa7ad2191de82_a-pexels-yan-krukau-8436601.jpg)Yoga![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654d5a0375a17dfee3425e02/65dce43a0a8a6abd353453c2_chevron-right-white.svg)](https://arketa.com/</business-type/yoga>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654d5a0375a17dfee3425e02/65f354b4f5b9c201522efc6e_iStock-1447561928.jpg)Group fitness![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654d5a0375a17dfee3425e02/65dce43a0a8a6abd353453c2_chevron-right-white.svg)](https://arketa.com/</business-type/group-fitness>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654d5a0375a17dfee3425e02/65e258da6ee7e5acd126e145_a-full-shot-women-doing-pilates-together%20\(1\).jpg)Pilates![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654d5a0375a17dfee3425e02/65dce43a0a8a6abd353453c2_chevron-right-white.svg)](https://arketa.com/</business-type/pilates>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654d5a0375a17dfee3425e02/65dce43a0a8a6abd353453de_sav-header.jpg)Fit pro![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654d5a0375a17dfee3425e02/65dce43a0a8a6abd353453c2_chevron-right-white.svg)](https://arketa.com/</business-type/digital-studio>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654d5a0375a17dfee3425e02/65f3555b14276f99131f8b1d_iStock-1925834216.jpg)Spin![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654d5a0375a17dfee3425e02/65dce43a0a8a6abd353453c2_chevron-right-white.svg)](https://arketa.com/</business-type/spin>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654d5a0375a17dfee3425e02/65dce43a0a8a6abd353453cf_suana-spa.jpeg)Wellness![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654d5a0375a17dfee3425e02/65dce43a0a8a6abd353453c2_chevron-right-white.svg)](https://arketa.com/</business-type/wellness>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654d5a0375a17dfee3425e02/65ca76e334f054da69efcf4d_pexels-elina-fairytale-3822668.jpg)
### Studios
Group & livestream classes
Appointment bookings
Referral programs
1:1 Texting
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654d5a0375a17dfee3425e02/65ca77a58b1223afb5a52532_63986434fb3f9d10ac767196_Sav_311%20copy%202.jpg)
### Individuals
Unlimited video storage
Livestream classes
Courses & digital products
Branded apps
Opening a new studio or concept? Join our [**New Studio Program**](https://arketa.com/</business-type/new-studio>)**.**
We chose Arketa because right from the start, we could tell that the team understood the needs of small businesses like us. Since switching from Mindbody to Arketa, **the stress of studio ownership has dramatically** **decreased**. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654d5a0375a17dfee3425e02/65f46ee2da4ced7b21efd0f0_Untitled%20design%20\(6\).png)
Carson F.
Balance Yoga + Barre
## Create your dream business
Increase revenue
Add new revenue streams with a video library, courses, and retreats.Allow loyal customers to "Book a Friend" or automate referrals.‍Cut down on software costs by using less tools.
Reach new leads
Attract new customers and enhance your SEO with automated Google reviews and by empowering them to book directly through Google.Drive new leads from ads and social media efforts with our high-converting forms.Build custom email and text automations to personalize the experience to convert new customers.
Save time managing clients
Add new clients in to class in seconds.Build workflows for late cancel and no shows and easily resolve unpaid reservations.‍Connect with your customers via 1-to-1 texting right from your dashboard.
Showcase your brand
With Arketa, customers never leave your website.Customize our scheduling widgets to match your colors and fonts.Bring your brand to life with your own website and branded app.
### See how Arketa works for you
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654d5a0375a17dfee3425e02/65e26917266679091d352c70_Untitled%20design%20\(2\).png)](https://arketa.com/<#>)
### Trusted by 1000+ businesses
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654d5a0375a17dfee3425e02/65f36c306cd348d9801e9e67_2e143a28-640c-470a-a511-b4899a4c9cf3.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654d5a0375a17dfee3425e02/65f36c30b1dc23bbdc1be517_765a0dd6-2c61-4292-a9e8-4a537af0e255.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654d5a0375a17dfee3425e02/67896fa55f7f06c305b52e13_College%20Park%20Yoga%20Instagram%20Post%20\(3\).png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654d5a0375a17dfee3425e02/678870b52bad33ba54ae1913_IF%20Studio%20Logo.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654d5a0375a17dfee3425e02/65f36d2464863acea94414ad_2a36964b-e6d8-4527-af6e-a2a606651b69.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654d5a0375a17dfee3425e02/67886fdfd7cd3c625f8f1f72_Together%20Logo%20White%20\(1\).png)

generated_description:
### Overview of Arketa

**Company Name:** Arketa  
**Founded:** 2020  
**Headquarters:** New York  
**Team Size:** 55 employees  
**Batch:** Y Combinator Batch S20  
**Website:** [arketa.com](https://arketa.com)  

Arketa is carving out a niche in the wellness and fitness industry with its compelling mission: to provide "Everything for your fitness or wellness business." The company started as an all-in-one platform designed for fitness professionals to manage both online and in-person classes, video-on-demand content, courses, and website hosting.

### Core Features

1. **Booking System:**
   - Classes and appointment scheduling
   - Membership and loyalty management
   - Operations and reporting tools

2. **Digital Solutions:**
   - On-demand video library
   - Comprehensive courses and programs

3. **CRM and Marketing:**
   - Client relationship management
   - Multi-channel communication
   - Automation features to enhance marketing efforts

4. **Web Presence:**
   - Custom branded websites
   - Mobile apps tailored for individual brands

### Target Audience

Arketa serves a diverse range of fitness and wellness businesses:
- **Business Types:** From individual instructors and new studios to multi-location enterprises.
- **Modalities:** Yoga, Pilates, group fitness, HIIT, recovery, and wellness studios, to name a few.

### Unique Value Proposition

Arketa distinguishes itself with a user-friendly approach to booking software. It's designed to streamline operations, improve client experiences, and drive revenue growth. The platform promises beautiful client checkouts, effective marketing automations, and dedicated support, all tailored for the unique needs of fitness businesses.

### Testimonials and Impact

Customers report a significant reduction in operational stress after switching to Arketa, showcasing the platform's effectiveness in simplifying business management. For instance, Carson from Balance Yoga + Barre states that since adopting Arketa, "the stress of studio ownership has dramatically decreased."

### Conclusion

In a world where wellness and fitness businesses need to adapt swiftly to changing demands, Arketa offers an integrated solution that facilitates growth and enhances efficiency. The commitment to understanding and catering to small business needs is evident and positions Arketa as a trustworthy partner in the fitness community.

For more information, check out their website at [arketa.com](https://arketa.com), where you can book a demo or start a free trial to see how Arketa can elevate your fitness or wellness business.
